line_2: The wonders of each region view,
And He, in one astonish'd View,

line_1: O'er ravag'd fields of rich Peru,
Not a' the wealth o' rich Peru
line_2: The gentlest gales that ever blew

line_1: Survey mankind, from China to Peru;
Laugh at the lesser Treasures of Peru;
line_2: The Golden Shoals thy very Nets pursue,

line_1: So two Rich Mountains of Peru
line_2: May rush to Wealthy Marriage too,

line_1: Who cost no sixpence, and who seem Peru!
line_2: Spare Lovegold sees his houshold god in you,
